casebody.data:
Marc CONEY
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016

Kinga A. Kostaniak, in support of the petition.

Nancy L. Walker, in opposition.

*682The plaintiff's petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 902, 137 A.3d 968 (2016), is denied.
